About the Case

Rasmea Odeh is a 67 year old Palestinian American community leader who was tortured by the Israeli government in 1969. On November 10th in front of supporters in the courtroom, Rasmea was found guilty of xxxxxxxx. Though Rasmea has been unjustly convicted, her struggle is far from over.

FBI Repression

Rasmea's case is part of a larger campaign of government repression waged against anti-war, social justice, and solidarity activists. To learn more about these attacks and how to join the struggle for justice, visit stopfbi.net.
